item.title: How I Passed The Azure DP-100 Exam
item.description: Like many people, I kicked off this year with a long list of resolutions. My list includes items like learning how to do a backflip, but thatâ€™s a story for another time! One of my top three goals, and the one has come up regularly over the last couple of years, was to make an active effort learning cloud computing. Luckily, my current employer has chosen Microsoft Azure as their cloud platform, hence allowing me to focus on it.
